text:
{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>
  In dem Brandmüllerischen Buchladen wird ein 
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Project von Hiorini, klugen und verständigen Hauß-Patter, wie auch avelichem Land-Leben</TITLE>
    <AUTHOR>Hiorini</AUTHOR>
    <VOLUME>2. Folianten</VOLUME>
    <PRIZE>6. fl.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>.
  Ferner ist allda neu fertig worden:
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Lutheri</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Bibel</TITLE>
    <NOTE>mit Figuren</NOTE>
    <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>;
  Item,
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Fleury</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Kirchen-Historien</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <NOTE>aus dem frantzösischen übersetzt</NOTE>
  </BIBL>;
  Item,
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Die gantze Pflicht des Menschen</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <NOTE>aus dem Englischen übersetzt</NOTE>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":7,"explanation":"1. Removed duplicated/stray </TITLE> and created one consistent <TITLE> element for the first bibliographical entry.
2. Added <AUTHOR>, <VOLUME> and <PRIZE> elements inside the first <BIBL> to keep the structure coherent.
3. Wrapped the information on Fleury’s ‘Kirchen-Historien’ in a new <BIBL> block that was missing in the source.
4. Added <NOTE> elements to capture free-text qualifiers such as ‘mit Figuren’ and translation remarks.
5. Corrected incorrectly encoded special characters (e.g. “√∞” → “ü”).
6. Normalised spacing/line-breaks and supplied a terminal full stop where necessary so the XML is well-formed.
7. Ensured that every opened tag is properly closed (including the outermost <ITEM>)."}

parsed.fixed_xml:
<ITEM>
  In dem Brandmüllerischen Buchladen wird ein 
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Project von Hiorini, klugen und verständigen Hauß-Patter, wie auch avelichem Land-Leben</TITLE>
    <AUTHOR>Hiorini</AUTHOR>
    <VOLUME>2. Folianten</VOLUME>
    <PRIZE>6. fl.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>.
  Ferner ist allda neu fertig worden:
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Lutheri</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Bibel</TITLE>
    <NOTE>mit Figuren</NOTE>
    <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>;
  Item,
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Fleury</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Kirchen-Historien</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <NOTE>aus dem frantzösischen übersetzt</NOTE>
  </BIBL>;
  Item,
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Die gantze Pflicht des Menschen</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT>
    <NOTE>aus dem Englischen übersetzt</NOTE>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
1. Removed duplicated/stray </TITLE> and created one consistent <TITLE> element for the first bibliographical entry.
2. Added <AUTHOR>, <VOLUME> and <PRIZE> elements inside the first <BIBL> to keep the structure coherent.
3. Wrapped the information on Fleury’s ‘Kirchen-Historien’ in a new <BIBL> block that was missing in the source.
4. Added <NOTE> elements to capture free-text qualifiers such as ‘mit Figuren’ and translation remarks.
5. Corrected incorrectly encoded special characters (e.g. “√∞” → “ü”).
6. Normalised spacing/line-breaks and supplied a terminal full stop where necessary so the XML is well-formed.
7. Ensured that every opened tag is properly closed (including the outermost <ITEM>).
